text: Rebecca Stella Simonsson (born 29 September 1985) is a Swedish model and television presenter. She was part of the music group Sunblock. She presents the "after show" for the reality series Paradise Hotel.Sunblock, Last FM, retrieved 11 January 2014 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Swedish models Category:Swedish television presenters
title: Rebecca Simonsson
